title: New: Washed Out – Don’t Give Up
content:
Lyric videos.

Ugh. Anyway, Washed Out, we forgive you. Still refusing to drop the Hipster Runoff coined genre chillwave, new track Don’t Give Up doesn’t sway too far from the sound that brought him his initial success, yet drops any bedroom-produced connotations. This is bolder, more openly anthemic, sampling the sound of a bustling crowd, alongside his trademark tribal beats and reverb heavy vocals. Check out Don’t Give Up below, taken from his new record Paracosm out August 2013 on SubPop.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
